name: Spider Crawler (Dabbo)
description:
This was a game made for the 2021 global game jam.

This year's theme was "Lost and Found", and so we blazed through the 48 hours we had to make this top-down roguelike game from the ground up, completely online.

Have fun!

Credits:
Flavio Abreu - Game Design / 2D Art / Asset Design
Ricardo Nunes - 2D Art / Character Design / UI / 2D Animation
Joao Azuil - Programming / Level Design
David (me) - Programming / Sound Design
Filipe Santos - Programming
